title: The Black & Tan Appliquéd Clutch with Detachable Straps
description: We have re-designed the appliquéd clutch to have detachable hardware so that this bag can be convertable into a clutch, a shoulder bag or a cross body bag. We have added brass hardware on the front and a soft detachable leather handle that can be adjusted in length depending on how you want to wear it. Our tan appliqued clutch uses a high quality black pv appliqué and brass hardware on the zipper pull. It is a great little piece that is neutral and can pair with any outfit for witty and chic flair. It's great also as a travel organizer or a poolside clutch. 9"T x 11"W.
